ofcprobe.vswitch.connection

Class OFConnection1_zero

  • java.lang.Object
    • ofcprobe.vswitch.connection.OFConnection1_zero
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IOFConnection

    public class OFConnection1_zero
extends java.lang.Object
implements IOFConnection
    The Connection Handler aka ofSwitch for OpenFlow Version 1.0
    Author:
    Christopher Metter
